original_text: Now the Philistines fought against Israel: and the men of Israel fled from before the Philistines, and fell down slain in mount Gilboa.
korean_text: 블레셋 사람들이 이스라엘을 치매 이스라엘 사람들이 블레셋 사람들 앞에서 도망하여 길보아 산에서 엎드러져 죽으니라

sentences.original_text: Now the Philistines fought against Israel
and the men of Israel fled from before the Philistines
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 사람들이 블레셋 사람들 앞에서 도망쳤으며

sentences.original_text: and fell down slain in mount Gilboa
